methods.name: CalibrateThermistor
methods.summary: Tell BT6xx to run thermistor calibration using provided calibration parameters

params.name: p1
params.description: Ideal ADC counts for 560 Ohm resistor (R1 = 559.4 ohms --> C1 = 4096 * 559.4/(10000 + 559.4) = 217.0)

items.name: ge
items.description: This is applied to all thermistor readings

items.name: oe
items.description: This is applied to all thermistor readings

methods.name: TestLed
methods.summary: Turn green LED on, then red on, green off, and finally red off.

params.name: p1
params.description: Duration in milliseconds for each step

items.name: ge
items.description: This is applied to all thermistor readings

items.name: oe
items.description: This is applied to all thermistor readings

methods.name: Set_Rtc
methods.description: Time in seconds.  Reference is often Jan 1, 1970

methods.name: Get_Rtc
methods.description: Time in seconds.  Default reference is Jan 1, 1970

params.name: p1
params.description: Dummy Parameter required for test tool

methods.name: Load_Parameter_File
methods.description: Used in conjunction with file system commands

params.name: p1
params.description: Dummy Parameter required for test tool

methods.name: Dump_Parameter_File
methods.summary: Dump chosen parameters to a file
methods.description: Used in conjunction with file system commands

items.name: r
items.description: negative error code, length of file in bytes on success

methods.name: Prepare_Log
methods.description: Used in conjunction with file system commands to read logs

items.name: r
items.description: negative error code, number of log files to read on success

items.name: s
items.summary: The size of the log file to read
items.description: the size of the log file

items.name: n
items.description: The absolute path name of the log on the file system

methods.name: Factory_Reset
methods.summary: This will force a factory reset of the device.

schema.name: Device Parameters List.
schema.description: The following parameters are interfaceable on the device.

x-deviceparameters.name: sensorName
x-deviceparameters.summary: Sensor Name

x-deviceparameters.name: sensorLocation
x-deviceparameters.summary: Sensor Location

x-deviceparameters.name: advertisingInterval
x-deviceparameters.summary: Advertising Interval in milliseconds

x-deviceparameters.name: advertisingDuration
x-deviceparameters.summary: Advertising duration of an event in milliseconds. 0=No events advertised

x-deviceparameters.name: passkey
x-deviceparameters.summary: Six-Digit Numberic Passkey

x-deviceparameters.name: lock
x-deviceparameters.summary: 1 = locked, 0 = unlock: Used by the mobile APP to indicate settings are locked

x-deviceparameters.name: batterySenseInterval
x-deviceparameters.summary: Battery Sense interval in seconds

x-deviceparameters.name: temperatureSenseInterval
x-deviceparameters.summary: Temperature Sense interval in seconds

x-deviceparameters.name: AggregationCount
x-deviceparameters.summary: Aggregation value used on all the sensor data

x-deviceparameters.name: digitalOutput1State
x-deviceparameters.summary: false = off, true - on

x-deviceparameters.name: digitalOutput2State
x-deviceparameters.summary: false = off, true - on

x-deviceparameters.summary:
Firmware Version.

x-deviceparameters.name: activeMode
x-deviceparameters.summary:
0 = inactive (shelf mode)
1 = active (sample enabled)

x-deviceparameters.name: useCodedPhy
x-deviceparameters.summary: Coded Phy Value

x-deviceparameters.name: txPower
x-deviceparameters.summary: Tx Power (dBm)

x-deviceparameters.name: networkId
x-deviceparameters.summary: Network Id

x-deviceparameters.name: configVersion
x-deviceparameters.summary: Config Version
x-deviceparameters.description: This is used for synchronization between clients (Bluegrass/Phone application).

x-deviceparameters.name: configType
x-deviceparameters.summary:
0 = Not Configured
1 = Analog
2 = Digital
3 = Temperature
4 = Current
5 = UltraSonic/Pressure
6 = SPI/I2C
x-deviceparameters.description: Writing this will cause other attributes to be set with the correct value.

x-deviceparameters.name: hardwareMinorVersion
x-deviceparameters.summary: Hardware minor version set during production
x-deviceparameters.x-review: should this just be Hardware Version, there aren't resistors on the board

x-deviceparameters.name: ge
x-deviceparameters.summary: ADC Calibrated Thermistor Gain Error

x-deviceparameters.name: oe
x-deviceparameters.summary: ADC calibrated offset error

x-deviceparameters.name: oldCoefficientA
x-deviceparameters.summary: This is not used

x-deviceparameters.name: oldCoefficientB
x-deviceparameters.summary: This is not used

x-deviceparameters.name: oldCoefficientC
x-deviceparameters.summary: This is not used

x-deviceparameters.name: thermistorConfig
x-deviceparameters.summary: Bitmask of Thermistor Inputs.  Bit 0 is thermistor 1.  1 is enabled, 0 is disabled

x-deviceparameters.name: temperatureResult1
x-deviceparameters.summary: Temperature in C

x-deviceparameters.name: temperatureResult2
x-deviceparameters.summary: Temperature in C

x-deviceparameters.name: temperatureResult3
x-deviceparameters.summary: Temperature in C

x-deviceparameters.name: temperatureResult4
x-deviceparameters.summary: Temperature in C

x-deviceparameters.name: temperatureAlarms
x-deviceparameters.summary:
Bitmask for all 4 channels and each alarm.
 dddddcccccbbbbbaaaaa
x-deviceparameters.description:
PORT1_H1_BITMASK = 1 
PORT1_H2_BITMASK = 2 
PORT1_L1_BITMASK = 4 
PORT1_L2_BITMASK = 8 
PORT1_DELTA_BITMASK = 16 

PORT2_H1_BITMASK = 32 
PORT2_H2_BITMASK = 64 
PORT2_L1_BITMASK = 128 
PORT2_L2_BITMASK = 256 
PORT2_DELTA_BITMASK = 512 

PORT3_H1_BITMASK = 1024 
PORT3_H2_BITMASK = 2048 
PORT3_L1_BITMASK = 4096 
PORT3_L2_BITMASK = 8192 
PORT3_DELTA_BITMASK = 16384 

PORT4_H1_BITMASK = 32768 
PORT4_H2_BITMASK = 65535 
PORT4_L1_BITMASK = 131072 
 PORT4_L2_BITMASK = 262144 
PORT4_DELTA_BITMASK = 524288

x-deviceparameters.name: batteryVoltageMv
x-deviceparameters.summary: Battery Voltage in millivolts
x-deviceparameters.description: Not a float to match previous system

x-deviceparameters.name: digitalInput
x-deviceparameters.summary: Bit 0 is digital input 1, Bit 1 is digital input 2

x-deviceparameters.name: digitalAlarms
x-deviceparameters.summary: Bitmask of alarms for Digital Inputs 1 and 2; Alarm is set when 1

x-deviceparameters.name: digitalInput1Config
x-deviceparameters.summary:
Bit 7 : Enable/Disable; Bits 1:0 Alarm Enumeration:
 0 = None
 1 = falling edge
 2 = rising edge
 3 = both

x-deviceparameters.name: digitalInput2Config
x-deviceparameters.summary:
Bit 7 : Enable/Disable; Bits 1:0 Alarm Enumeration:
 0 = None
 1 = falling edge
 2 = rising edge
 3 = both

x-deviceparameters.summary: Unit depends on Analog Input Configuration Type. Units will either be in mV or mA

x-deviceparameters.summary:
Bitmask for all 4 channels and each alarm.
 dddddcccccbbbbbaaaaa
x-deviceparameters.description:
PORT1_H1_BITMASK = 1 
PORT1_H2_BITMASK = 2

PORT2_H1_BITMASK = 32

x-deviceparameters.name: analogInput1Type
x-deviceparameters.summary: Analog Input Channel 1 configuration
x-deviceparameters.description:
Enumeration:
 0 = Unused
 1 = Voltage (0V - 10V DC)
 2 = Current (4mA - 20mA)
 3 = Pressure
 4 = Ultrasonic
 5 = ACCurrent20A
 6 = ACCurrent150A
 7 = ACCurrent500A
If changing a pressure sensor port, then any active pressure sensor ports must be first set to 0.

schema.x-review: can we link an enumeration to these?

x-deviceparameters.summary: Analog Input Channel 2 configuration

x-deviceparameters.summary: Analog Input Channel 3 configuration

x-deviceparameters.name: analogInput4Type
x-deviceparameters.summary: Analog Input Channel 4 configuration

x-deviceparameters.summary: Flags

x-deviceparameters.name: magnetState
x-deviceparameters.summary:
Magnet State
 0 = Magnet Near, 1 = Magnet Far

x-deviceparameters.name: paramPath
x-deviceparameters.summary: Folder on file system used for Parse/Dump commands

x-deviceparameters.name: batteryAge
x-deviceparameters.summary: Time in seconds that the battery has been in use

x-deviceparameters.name: apiVersion
x-deviceparameters.summary: The API version that the current firmware supports

schema.x-review: the default value for this should be generated by python script

x-deviceparameters.summary: Quasi-RTC (epoch, Seconds from Jan 1, 1970)

x-deviceparameters.name: qrtcLastSet
x-deviceparameters.summary: Last time the RTC was set

x-deviceparameters.name: shOffset
x-deviceparameters.summary: Steinhart-Hart Temperature Equation offset

x-deviceparameters.name: analogSenseInterval
x-deviceparameters.summary: analog Sense interval in seconds

x-deviceparameters.name: tamperSwitchStatus
x-deviceparameters.summary: Returns the current state of the tamper switch
x-deviceparameters.description:
True = Tamper switch active (not pressed) 
False = Tamper switch inactive (pressed).

x-deviceparameters.name: connectionTimeoutSec
x-deviceparameters.summary:
How long is the device connected to the app in seconds 
Setting to 0 will disable

x-deviceparameters.name: settingsPasscode
x-deviceparameters.summary: Six digit numeric passcode to unlock device settings.
